Articles.Content:
I can see the little MechJeb box with the antenna and red and green light in my science center and in my parts list in the VAB. I actually think there are 3 pics of the box in the same science category in the science center, and I have clicked all 3. The one in the parts list in the VAB is still greyed out. Is there something special I have to do with the Mod to make it work in career mode, it works fine in sandbox.

Thanks

Tuck
Make sure you have it actually "researched" in the tech tree. Some add-ons require you to manually research parts of a level and are not just done automatically.
If it's in the parts list at the VAB but grayed out, make sure you aren't trying to select it as your first piece.

if you installed MJ in an allready running savegame, then you need to go to research and add MJ to the researched items.

Every mod that is installed into a running savegame, needs to be researched (costs no Science points though)
